Vectorized isTRUE

Source: R/jamba.r
isTRUEV.Rd

Vectorized isTRUE

isTRUEV(x, ...)

Arguments

x

vector

...

additional arguments are ignored

Details

This function applies three criteria to an input vector, to determine if each entry in the vector is TRUE:

  1. It must be class logical.

  2. It must not be NA.

  3. It must evaluate as TRUE.

See also
